events.name: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_label: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.
events.description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.

events.name: Upcoming meeting details
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).

events.name: Coordination on export controls
events.wd_description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.
events.description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.

events.name: Cooperation on information manipulation
events.wd_description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.
events.description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_label: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.
events.description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.

events.name: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_label: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.
events.description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.

events.name: Smoke Pollution in the Midwest
events.wd_description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.
events.description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.

events.name: Warnings and Public Health Precautions
events.wd_description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.
events.description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.

events.name: Alleged Russian strike in Dnipro
events.wd_description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.
events.description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.
events.description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.
events.description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.

events.name: Biden Administration's EV Plan
events.wd_description: The Biden administration aims to electrify up to two-thirds of the nation's new cars within a decade, relying on securing critical minerals for EV batteries.
events.description: The Biden administration aims to electrify up to two-thirds of the nation's new cars within a decade, relying on securing critical minerals for EV batteries.

events.name: EPA Proposed Tailpipe Rules
events.wd_description: The EPA's proposed rules aim to limit emissions from cars, SUVs, and trucks on U.S. roads by 2032, assuming lithium prices will stabilize by the mid-2020s.
events.description: The EPA's proposed rules aim to limit emissions from cars, SUVs, and trucks on U.S. roads by 2032, assuming lithium prices will stabilize by the mid-2020s.

events.name: Price Forecasts
events.wd_description: The EPA expects lithium prices to stabilize at historic levels, based on proprietary forecasts, analysis, and news stories.
events.description: The EPA expects lithium prices to stabilize at historic levels, based on proprietary forecasts, analysis, and news stories.

events.name: Emission Limits
events.wd_description: The proposed rules aim to significantly limit emissions from vehicles, encouraging a shift to electric vehicles.
events.description: The proposed rules aim to significantly limit emissions from vehicles, encouraging a shift to electric vehicles.

events.name: Critical Mineral Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The U.S. aims to shift the supply chain for critical minerals like lithium, cobalt, and nickel to domestic and allied sources.
events.description: The U.S. aims to shift the supply chain for critical minerals like lithium, cobalt, and nickel to domestic and allied sources.

events.name: Volatility in Mineral Markets
events.wd_description: The market for critical minerals is volatile, with uncertain pricing and supply availability.
events.description: The market for critical minerals is volatile, with uncertain pricing and supply availability.

events.name: Supply Chain Uncertainty
events.wd_description: Uncertainty around the pace of permitting new mines and establishing supply chains for refining and processing minerals.
events.description: Uncertainty around the pace of permitting new mines and establishing supply chains for refining and processing minerals.

events.name: Inflation Reduction Act Incentives
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act includes incentives to support domestic production of EV batteries and critical minerals.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act includes incentives to support domestic production of EV batteries and critical minerals.

events.name: Tax Credits
events.wd_description: EVs can receive tax credits if a significant portion of battery minerals and components are sourced domestically or from U.S. trade allies.
events.description: EVs can receive tax credits if a significant portion of battery minerals and components are sourced domestically or from U.S. trade allies.

events.name: Domestic Production Goals
events.wd_description: The Act aims to encourage the establishment of battery manufacturing facilities and mining projects in the U.S.
events.description: The Act aims to encourage the establishment of battery manufacturing facilities and mining projects in the U.S.
